entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:51 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -24.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -24.9°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -27.8°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
